comment: He made this class super easy and engaging. I learned so much in this class and actually enjoyed it. He grades super fast and is understanding. Also he responds to emails almost immediately. Great guy!

Dr Wynn knows a lot about the course material and cares that students actually learned something instead of just spitting back information. Very sweet guy and always open and very quick to responses and concerns by students. I had a lot of fun in this class and I'm sad to see him retire!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: TAKE HIS CLASS! Best professor I've had. He responds to emails promptly and truly wants his students to succeed. He usually has module lectures and then 2 assignments every week which include a spoken assignment and quiz. He lets you use your notes to help you with the assignments and the information always correlates to each other.

Dr. Wynn is a wonderful and passionate professor. Don't miss your chance to take this course with him! This was the best course I have taken at Kennesaw State University. Attendance is required, but he makes his lectures incredibly informative and engaging. Even if attendance was not required, you would not want to miss a single day of class.

He is extremely passionate about history and is super engaging and exciting in class. Wynn is also super caring and is constantly reaching out to ensure success. The class is 2 tests and a group project, the project is an Easy A but the tests were difficult, as long as you try you will pass this class. Awesome professor.

Dr. Wynn is by far one of the best professors I have had the pleasure of learning from. He is always willing to help and gives great feedback! If you ever have the chance to take his class, I highly recommend you do so.

Listen to the lectures and you'll be fine. The tests were very straightforward and this class wasn't very time consuming. Additionally Prof Wynn responded to emails very quickly and was always a pleasure. He truly cared about his students, even in the online format. The class was easy to navigate digitally and the lectures were interesting

Dr. Wynn is super straightforward and lets you know what he expects of quizzes and tests. The assessments make up most of the grade but they are not hard at all. As long as you go over his lectures youll be fine. Hes also very nice and responds to emails super quickly. He made me interested in history.

Super nice guy! Took this online due to covid, but he formatted everything so good step by step and in details how to do your work. 2 tests and each week a quiz or little assignment, not hard to do. He really cares about you and helps you a lot if you have questions.

He really cares about what he is teaching and he is so nice. We had to be online because of covid but he made it easy to follow along and learn through his lecture videos. Would recommend- the only thing that some may call a downside is that you have to do every assignment or he wont let you pass, but this holds you accountable! not a harsh grader

Professor Wynn was absolutely amazing!! I've never been strong in history, but he explains everything extremely well and truly wants all of his students to succeed. He is extremely diligent replying to emails, and his assignments are reflective upon what he teaches us. I strongly recommend taking him!

One of the best teachers I have had. He is very engaging, thoughtful, and creative. Not your typical powerpoint-quiz-test teacher. Powerpoint is the main source of notes given, but you do group work both in and outside of class. He responds very fast on email as well, typically by the end of the day of you emailing unless he is busy. Def take him!

Super caring professor and works with you to help you pass. Individually grades group projects so you don't have to worry about doing all the work and everybody getting credit. Very discussion based class. HIGHLY recommend

He is one of the best professors for history at KSU. He goes over every single answer on the exams before the exam. There is a huge group project, but he helps you at every single point. He basically gives you the answers to the project.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Amazing lectures

comment: The BEST prof. at KSU. Activities were engaging and so much fun. He make learning fun and helps all his students with any questions that they have! He is easy to talk to and reply to emails ASAP. I would take his class 1000 more times if I could. He supplies a study guide and has days where he goes over it. His is funny low key!
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: He's a good professor but you have to pay attention in class. Book isn't necessary because he knows more than the book. Good study guides. grading isn't all the way fair because i made all A's on everything except on the Tests where i made a B and ended up with a B.

One of the best professors I have EVER had, I took him over the summer of 2017. One of the first things he tells you is to not bother buying the book. If you pay attention & GO to class, participate in the disussions & activies then you will pass. I hope to ONLY take this professor from now on. 100% would take again, you should too!

Dr Wynn is an amazing professor. He is super enthusiastic about the material and is very engaging. He can make even the dullest material interesting. There are two tests and a group project which isnt so hard. If you are struggling in the class he will really try to help you too. Definitely one of the best professors at KSU!

Professor Wynn is easily the best professor I've had at KSU so far. He genuinely wants his students to do well and is more than willing to help them when asked. He also has some pretty adorable catch phrases that get thrown in there throughout the lectures. Highly recommended.
TAKE HIM! You will not regret AT ALL. He is the best professor I've had thus far. You don't have to do much at all. And he will help you through everything if you listen and pay attention. Easyyyy A.
He is so adorable and nice! He turns history into story time. There are 2 short super easy essays the whole semester and only one easy test and easy final. Take him if you can!!

Professor Wynn is such a passionate teacher. He really cares about each student and is very understanding and helpful. His class was always interesting with all different kinds of activities. Only 2 tests and 2 essays. I highly recommend him and would take him as a teacher again!

You can tell Professor Wynn loves what he does and he's a great teacher! He gives alot of notes but explains it in passionate ways that make it easier. Tests are hard because there is alot of information. Quizzes are open note and open book and he helps you out if you're struggling. He genuinely cares for is students. Loved Wynn TAKE HIM!!

He is by far one of the best history teachers I have ever had. It's not like the normal boring history class where you take notes the entire time. We did so many in class activities and only had 3 exams. 2 easy essays. He definitely won't bore you. You definitely need to study for the exams. Power points and study guide is posted but you must study

Dr. Wynn is the reason I became so interested in American history. His way of teaching history really grabs your attention and keeps it. He is so passionate about the topics he teaches and i love it. there are only two tests and two papers. if you show up to class and listen to what he has to offer, the class is very manageable.

I have never rated a professor before, but I enjoyed Dr. Wynn's class so much that I feel compelled to. He is an extremely passionate teacher and gets excited about the material in class. There was rarely a dull moment.                                                   Please, take this professor.

This is the most passionate teacher I have had to date!  He knows what he's talking about and wants his students to see the real life applications of the material.  He wants you to succeed and will help you to the best of his ability.  If you need this class,  Take.  Him.

Great Prof! Really enjoyed his class, and wanted to be there. I didn't take a single note or even bought the book and made an A. I do love history, so maybe not everyone can do that. But if you have the chance take HIM!

I've NEVER had a teacher so passionate about what he teaches. He makes learning interesting. He honestly cares so much about the subject AND his students. There's very few grades so you have to make sure you give your all. He prepares you very well for all the assignments though. Just show up to class and you'll do great.
Oh my god. Never saw a teacher with such passion. He is the best teacher and he is like a father. He makes sure you get the grade. Freaking aesome.

Dr. Wynn was super helpful and wants his students to succeed. Easy class, it's really hard not to make less than a B in his class. He cares deeply about his students and teaches history as if he was actually there. I definitely recommend Dr. Wynn!

Dr. Wynn is a great professor and the class is EXTREMELY easy. There are three essays, two tests, and a current issue presentation. We do ungraded hands-on activities. He basically gives us everything he can to help us succeed and it's up to you whether you use it or not. Definitely take his class!
